sentences.en: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto.
sentences.cn: 本租约持有人有权使用此建筑物以及所附属的土地。

sentences.en: Doing so will entitle the ticket holder to unlimited free parking.
sentences.cn: 这样做可以使持票人享有无限的免费停车权。

sentences.en: Andy Holder—the chief economist at The Bank of England—suggested that the UK move towards a government-backed digital currency.
sentences.cn: 英国央行的首席经济学家安迪·霍尔德建议，英国应尝试使用一种由政府支持的数字货币。
